mapper.insert: Insert into members (USERID, USERPW, USERNAME, GENDER, HOBBY, BIRTH, AGE, PHONE, ADDRESS, INTRODUCE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{gender}, #{hobby}, #{birth}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address} ,#{introduce})
mapper.select: select userId, userPw, userName from member where ( ( userId = #{userId} )and ( userPw = #{userPw} ) )
